name: fullstack-pern
description: this application demonstrates a fullstack PERN app
author: Edward Apostol

scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3002 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.modified-render-build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build && cd ../server
